_source.text: (225 school days) However, to find the answer to why kids from South Korea test better than our kids, the comparison cannot be limited to length of school.

text: (225 school days) However, to find the answer to why kids from **South** Korea test **better** **than** our
kids, the comparison cannot be limited to **length** of school.

_source.text: 5. If the length of the plot in east-west direction is more than that in north-south direction, it is better.

text: 5. If the **length** of the plot in east-west direction is more than that in north-**south** direction, it **is** **better**.
